2322f7af-f513-417a-9f14-7e18fda6e324.description: The BHP SPMF (Small Project Management Framework) Program, contextualises the specific needs of BHP staff responsible for managing small projects. The program takes participants through BHP’s SPMF, introducing them to the Project Management lifecycle and the fundamental functions of the role (including project planning, project organisation, and controlling/directing projects) and the knowledge and skills required to complete small projects within time, quality, and budgetary requirements.
2322f7af-f513-417a-9f14-7e18fda6e324.name: BHP Small Project Management Framework

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 3 day course

52451978-ab00-4566-acfe-83210563345d.description: Recognition of involvement as a mentor in the UQ MBA program. Achievements can be as varied as examining professional issues that impact on the mentee, obtaining exposure to new ideas and ways of thinking, advising on developing strengths and overcoming weaknesses, guiding professional development and career advancement, developing new skills and knowledge, obtaining recognition within the community, networking and guidance opportunities.
52451978-ab00-4566-acfe-83210563345d.name: UQ MBA Mentor

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: A mentor may share with a mentee information about his or her own career path, as well as provide guidance, motivation, emotional support, and role modelling. A mentor may help with exploring careers, setting goals, developing contacts and networks, and identifying resources via regular meetings.

957670e7-3986-43dc-8fd4-23b0e35404c8.description: Earners of this badge would be aware of the issuance of debt to fund public services, and the measures and techniques used to manage a range of financial risks in order to ensure the best value for money for business units and clients. They would have gained informative insight into the treasury management and funding activities of a central financing authority.
957670e7-3986-43dc-8fd4-23b0e35404c8.name: Central Treasury Management

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will have attended this two-day course, engaging in class discussions and exercises.

Earners will have engaged in a simulation exercise as a the manager of a central treasury authority that provides funding and financial support to public sector organisations and their business units. They would have worked in small teams to meet their clients’ unique funding requirements and risk tolerance to achieve the lowest possible cost of funds within the context of managing a large debt portfolio.

347b7187-452c-4bb4-a69e-d1a60ffd92b3.description: This badge has been awarded to individuals for their participation as a member of the Faculty of Business, Economics and Law Global Mates Student Leadership Team. As a volunteer member, this student has assisted in the development and implementation of events and activities for their peers in this program. As a result, this student has developed an array of skills in leadership, communication, multicultural, and multidisciplinary competence, working within a diverse team environment.
347b7187-452c-4bb4-a69e-d1a60ffd92b3.name: BEL Global Mates Student Leadership Team Member

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Leadership amongst peers in demonstrating the vision and mission of BEL Global Mates at events and activities.
Working successfully within a multidisciplinary, multicultural, and diverse team to deliver events and activities.
Communication skills in written, spoken and presentation for and in front of peers.
Problem solving, adaptability and innovation during a changing environment.

af8dc606-73aa-495b-9754-362e291a7122.description: Learning to Lead focuses on developing your personal leadership style and covers key topics, including managing tasks and performance, handling conflict, developing teams, and leadership and communication styles. It will equip you with the critical skills needed to make the transition from an individual contributor to a successful leader.
af8dc606-73aa-495b-9754-362e291a7122.name: Learning to Lead

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete short course.

491221bb-723f-48c6-af63-140b3bb7ad12.description: Finance for Non-Finance Managers demystifies accounting and finance by providing practical understanding of financial management including tools, techniques and terminology. Content includes accounting conventions, interpreting financial statements, cost and target costing, pricing, budgeting, discounting, margin management, variance analysis, ratios, ROI, variance analysis and financial decision-making.
491221bb-723f-48c6-af63-140b3bb7ad12.name: Finance for Non-Finance Managers

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete short course.

skills.name: Accounting And Finance Terminology And Conventions

c6edd4d8-0655-4dbb-bb31-0c5230b25327.description: Advanced Presentation Skills is designed to teach the skill of presenting, not just the knowledge behind it. Knowing what to say and how to present are essential, but only by understanding the skill of delivery will you have the greatest impact.
c6edd4d8-0655-4dbb-bb31-0c5230b25327.name: Advanced Presentation Skills

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

5fa4b791-ef4f-4256-aace-3b7cc88b13a7.description: This interactive course will set your organisation apart from competitors by equipping you with high-quality and cost-effective techniques to solve intricate challenges, seize new opportunities, and expand service offerings. You will learn how to apply the Design Thinking methodology to address challenges your business faces through an innovative approach. This course will urge you to learn through practical exercises, including addressing a real-life organisational problem via a Design Lab.
5fa4b791-ef4f-4256-aace-3b7cc88b13a7.name: Innovation with Design Thinking

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete short course.

be3719d3-0e19-4663-a6dd-94e0b9492f8e.description: Foreign Exchange has been designed for the Queensland public sector to provide them with some further insight into foreign exchange markets and the impacts these markets have on their everyday business. Earners will have deeper and practical understanding of financial market transactions, key drivers of foreign exchange rates, considerations to apply in hedging and Supply Chain Solution and managing foreign exchange exposures.
be3719d3-0e19-4663-a6dd-94e0b9492f8e.name: Foreign Exchange

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will have attended a half-day course
Earners will have engaged in class discussions with practical exercises to apply the techniques covered in this course to real-life scenarios.

72c714c9-f6b2-4ce7-8fe0-92e2f4d9b834.description: This course goes beyond best practice, equipping leaders with the knowledge and tools to adapt their leadership style to meet the needs of the team. Earners will have developed self-awareness of their personal leadership style. Building on this awareness, they will be able to critically analyse team dynamic, understand the different levers for influencing that dynamic, and formulate strategies for effective team leadership; thus boosting team performance.
72c714c9-f6b2-4ce7-8fe0-92e2f4d9b834.name: Leading Effective Teams

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will have participated in discussions and reflective activities in this two-day course
Earners will have completed pre-course online activities involving critical self-reflection on personal approach to team leadership
Earners will have developed their individual Leadership Action Plan

92ac7979-2e11-4f6c-9f01-8071bc62382e.description: Optimising Influence in Negotiation focuses on recognising and developing your individual negotiation style by considering your physiological and emotional responses. During the course, you will gain insights into the value of understanding other people’s behaviour styles and learn how to leverage their strengths and capitalise on their weaknesses. You will also learn how to plan and prepare a logical and structured approach to negotiation.
92ac7979-2e11-4f6c-9f01-8071bc62382e.name: Optimising Influence in Negotiation

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete short course.

d0e14f4c-59a2-4b6f-ba55-f4ee5ae700f5.description: Leading Innovation for Growth will provide you with a set of ‘must-have’ frameworks and tools to drive innovative responses to disruption and change. You’ll learn how to apply tools and frameworks to the innovation challenges faced by your organisation. You will also gain the ability to communicate and use innovation strategies for breakthrough ideas, and how to build and manage an innovation portfolio for continuous business improvement.
d0e14f4c-59a2-4b6f-ba55-f4ee5ae700f5.name: Leading Innovation for Growth

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a short course.

9f03a6f2-1ee5-48ee-a380-08725d0c04a0.description: Project and Change Management Essentials is a 2 day course that introduces you to the foundation principles and methodologies that focus on effectively managing critical project elements and any related change. You will work through the project lifecycle from the project initiation to completing the transition of the project to business as usual. The course combines active class discussions with practical activities to break down concepts.
9f03a6f2-1ee5-48ee-a380-08725d0c04a0.name: Project and Change Management Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a face to face 2 day course comprising of class discussions, practical and reflective activities and self-paced learning.

1be1179b-ac1e-4425-8c8a-6fb4171e5eca.description: Developing and Evaluating Business Cases is a one and half day course that will equip you with the skills and knowledge to develop and evaluate robust, compelling, and effective business cases for your project proposals. The course combines class discussions with practical exercises, where you will have the opportunity to apply techniques in a real-life context. The material is presented in a concise and simplified manner to make it easy-to-understand and tailored to the public sector.
1be1179b-ac1e-4425-8c8a-6fb4171e5eca.name: Developing and Evaluating Business Cases

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of one full day face to face session and one 4-hour virtual session. These sessions will comprise of a dispersed learning format with, class discussions, practical exercises, reflective activities and self-paced learning.

8dca2510-19ff-4f18-a125-6598e79b6845.description: This course will help you gain the tools to reflect on your own practice and style to refine your negotiation methods and approach. It will help you to manage the stress that can accompany difficult negotiation situations and understand the process of effective communication. You will learn to apply academic thinking, enabling you to negotiate more collaboratively and confidently. You will be able to deal with the challenges of negotiation to meet the needs of a diverse range of stakeholders.
8dca2510-19ff-4f18-a125-6598e79b6845.name: Negotiating for Success

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will have completed online pre-course activities, attended a 2 day course and submitted an assessment to successfully complete this course.

846abb8f-5a0e-4014-be8a-56d696fd31b0.description: Asset Management is a one day course designed to enhance understanding of strategic asset management. The course includes class discussions with practical exercises for real-life context. Upon completion of the workshop participants will be able to understand: key asset management concepts and frameworks, factors impacting asset management maturity models and responsibilities of those involved in strategic asset management.
846abb8f-5a0e-4014-be8a-56d696fd31b0.name: Asset Management

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants will develop or review an asset management plan to reinforce the concepts introduced throughout the workshop.

93757e79-39c1-4344-a490-08aaab93b384.description: Business Cases in Practice is a one day course that provides the skills and knowledge to develop and analyse robust and effective business cases for project proposals. The course includes class discussions with practical exercises for real-life context. Upon completion of the workshop participants will be able to understand: financial governance frameworks, strategic project evaluation, inputs of a business case, needs/options analysis and complete NPV calculations.
93757e79-39c1-4344-a490-08aaab93b384.name: Business Cases in Practice

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants will evaluate and apply the various methodologies and technologies to develop and analyse a robust business case including the use of spreadsheets.

e1a526bd-9a2f-4a01-adf2-6872f0081d3c.description: Change Management is a one day course that provides the skills and knowledge to effectively manage project-related organisation change in the public sector. Participants are introduced to change leadership styles, including how to support different types of change and change resistance. Upon completion of the course participants are able to apply industry best-practice principles to change projects and integrate strategies to manage 'technical' and 'human' sides of change processes.
e1a526bd-9a2f-4a01-adf2-6872f0081d3c.name: Change Management

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants work in small teams on practical exercises to apply change management principles and techniques they have learned to real-world problems.

884f91ff-8338-4bff-b1f5-572e65d125c8.description: Financial Management in Practice is a one day course that provides a holistic view of elements that are required for making informed decisions to best serve local councils and communities. Participants will learn best-practices of financial management including: budgeting and forecasting, reporting, understanding financial statements and cash/debt management. Participants will be introduced to asset management, project management, service planning and strategic sustainability.
884f91ff-8338-4bff-b1f5-572e65d125c8.name: Financial Management in Practice

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants will work in small teams on practical exercises to apply techniques to real-life context of working within the Queensland public sector.

c10c5d44-6c7a-4039-bc22-69b933c6ad5c.description: Leadership for Executive Women emphasises personal values, building a vision, and developing leadership styles while allowing you to access new ideas and inspirational ways of thinking about leadership issues. The course explores insights into women's leadership, influencing models, and the power of a supportive peer network. The course is fully contextualised to address the issues facing women in executive leadership positions.
c10c5d44-6c7a-4039-bc22-69b933c6ad5c.name: Leadership for Executive Women

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

skills.name: Ability To Recognise And Develop One's Own Leadership Style

56fa62fc-30b8-4d38-9bb4-a4efdc780449.description: Project Management is a one day course that teaches participants the foundation principles and methodologies that focus on effectively managing critical project elements. Participants gain an understanding of best practice in project design and planning, effective stakeholder engagement and communication, project risk management and how to measure/report on performance. Upon completion of the course participants will be able to apply learnings to minimise project failure probability.
56fa62fc-30b8-4d38-9bb4-a4efdc780449.name: Project Management

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants work in small teams on practical exercises to apply project management principles and techniques they have learned to real-world problems.

94df7b59-650e-49d7-83eb-42e057bdabe3.description: Service Planning is a one and a half day course that provides earners of this badge with the skills and knowledge to develop strategic thinking to boost performance at a local government level. The course includes class discussions, case studies and practical activities. The capability to manage and monitor service delivery performance will be enhanced by more informed decision making.
94df7b59-650e-49d7-83eb-42e057bdabe3.name: Service Planning

issuer.summary: issued by The University of Queensland Business School

entity.name: The University of Queensland Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Participants will attend the one day in-person course followed by a half day virtual session. Participants will engage in class discussions and applied their learnings to a case study that reflects real-life scenarios.
